section_1_text.eng:
ğŸ†Talking about how we feel and the difficulties weâ€™re facing is a sign of strength - it can help make the whole family stronger!

ğŸ˜ƒ Sharing your challenges with your spouse is about making them more aware of how you are feeling.

ğŸ˜£ Starting something new can be difficult.
